title: What are the advantages of a Xiaomi Redmi phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first thing is price to performance ratio is tremendously a bang for you buck In malaysia, a price of redmi note 5 pro (3 gigs ram 32 gigs internal is about RM 800 or equal to 195 us dollars @ 172 euro. For that you get very good snapdragon 636 processor and 4000 mah big battery. In comparison asus zenfone 5 with same hardware but with apple rip off notched display if you liked it cost rm 1300 @ 317 us dollars @ 279 euro with smaller 3300 mah battery. Heck, even value nokia andeoid phone with same hardware nokia x6 cost more than redmi note 5 pro, about 231 $ @ 203 euro. Secondly, good build quality, even low end smartphone from xiaomi have ips display, at least 16, 32 or 64 gigs internal and huge battery. My mi max 2 have 5300 mah battery and lasted at least 3 days use normally. Even entry level redmi 4x have 4000 mah battery… However, if you live in u.s. or europe, western market coverage is still nil… warranty issues will arise if you import it from china… value price will also drops by shipping cost… So, choose other brand if you live west

Some Advantages of XIAOMI REDMI 9 : Redmi 9A Advantages of XIAOMI REDMI 9 have two options of internal memory. The smallest is 32 GB with 3 GB RAM and more expensive version use 64 GB with 4 GB RAM. We suggest to buy 64 GB storage with 4 GB RAM version, because more RAM will give more multitasking performance.Pros of XIAOMI REDMI 9 have multi camera at back side body with 13 MP f/2.2 for standard wide + 8 MP f/2.2 for ultrawide 118 degree + 5 MP f/2.4 for macro + 2 MP f/2.4 DOF or Bokeh.Pros of XIAOMI REDMI 9 have 3.5 mm headphone jack for connect with external headphone or audio devices.Goodness of XIAOMI REDMI 9 already have Infra-Red sensor.Pros of XIAOMI REDMI 9 LCD screen resolutions already have Full HD+ with 1080 x 2340 pixels.Strength of XIAOMI REDMI 9 have big battery capacity at 5000 mAh. It is very important to have big battery storage because we can use longer for doing daily activity. This phone also already have Fast Charging 18W
